Html: Sorry if this is already covered, I tried to find using search.  I found under tools where you can "refine item selection", but leather and cloth are grayed out.  Is it possible to turn it on so it shows stuff such as the Kirin Tor chest cloth piece?  (I realize it's not fully complete, but I was just wondering if it was possible)

What you can try doing is open ItemFilter.cs, find a section like this

    <item>
      <key>
        <string>Mage</string>
      </key>
      <value>
        <ArrayOfItemType>
          <ItemType>None</ItemType>
          <ItemType>Cloth</ItemType>
          <ItemType>Dagger</ItemType>
          <ItemType>OneHandSword</ItemType>
          <ItemType>Staff</ItemType>
          <ItemType>Wand</ItemType>
        </ArrayOfItemType>
      </value>
    </item>

for resto shaman model and add ItemType for Cloth and Leather. I'm not sure if it'll work, but give it a try.
Odd, all are listed in the model as relevant types, able to post your character's xml?
This has been fixed in the most recent build.
Please add fist weapon also as a relevant type.  There's only one at the moment but it's pretty good and someday there may be more.
Ah, Wraith Strike.  Fixed to include fist weapons in build 30952.
